{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}} – three mountain peaks. In the Oracle Bone Script, they were represented by triangles rather than vertical strokes. Compare {{zh-l|丘}}, particularly earlier forms.

===Etymology===
{{unk.|lang=zh}} – no known cognates outside Sino-Bai. Cognate with {{cog|bca|svrt||mountain}} (< Proto-Bai *''sro⁴''). Starostin compares it with {{cog|pdu||sʰôn|mountain}}.
